description: Prepare the foundational structure of the project, including directory setup and initial configuration files. Ensure the structure supports scalability and modularity as the project grows.
Design the database tables and relationships required for the application. Ensure the schema supports the necessary data storage, retrieval, and integrity requirements for future development.
Set up and configure the development, testing, and production environments. Ensure proper configurations are in place for efficient development workflows and scalability in production.
Develop a secure user authentication system using token-based sessions. Ensure features like password recovery, email verification, and role-based access are implemented.
Create a customizable user profile page that allows users to update their personal information and settings. Design with usability and accessibility in mind to ensure a smooth user experience.
Integrate cloud storage solutions like AWS S3 or Google Cloud Storage to handle file uploads and retrievals. Ensure security and proper access control for stored files.
Develop API endpoints to handle user login, including token-based authentication. The endpoints should securely authenticate users and return necessary session data.
Design and develop reusable frontend components for the user dashboard, such as charts, tables, and user statistics. Ensure components are responsive and integrate well with backend services.
Perform end-to-end testing for the user authentication system to ensure security and smooth user experience. Test all possible edge cases, including incorrect login attempts and password resets.
Refactor and optimize database queries to improve performance, particularly for high-traffic pages. Focus on reducing latency and enhancing overall responsiveness of the application.

summary: Fix UI BUGs in user profile
description: Resolve reported UI issues on the user profile page, including layout problems, missing elements, or inconsistencies between different screen sizes. Ensure compatibility with all major browsers.
Design and implement a user roles and permissions system that controls access to various features based on the user's role (e.g., admin, user, guest). Ensure security and scalability.
Design an engaging and responsive landing page that aligns with the overall brand and product vision. Focus on providing a clear call to action and intuitive navigation for users.
Ensure that the entire application is mobile-friendly by optimizing the UI for smaller screens. This includes touch-friendly design, fast loading times, and mobile-specific navigation.
Add social login options such as Google, Facebook, and Twitter to enhance user convenience and reduce sign-up friction. Ensure secure integration and proper user data handling.
Refactor the user dashboard to improve performance and usability. Focus on reducing load times, cleaning up the code, and enhancing the user interface for a better experience.
Integrate the application with third-party services like email providers, payment systems, and analytics platforms. Ensure seamless interaction between the application and these external systems.

summary: Create admin panel for user management
description: Build an admin panel to manage user accounts and roles, including capabilities like banning, promoting, and assigning permissions to users. Ensure the interface is easy to navigate for administrators.

summary: Write unit tests for API services
description: Develop unit tests for the API services to ensure each endpoint is functioning correctly. Focus on covering edge cases and validating expected responses for different inputs.
Update the user documentation to reflect recent changes in the application, including new features and UI updates. Ensure all instructions are clear and helpful for end users.
Enhance the security of user data by implementing encryption, secure storage solutions, and proper validation of sensitive information such as passwords and personal description.

summary: Add analytics tracking for user actions
description: Implement tracking for key user actions like logins, signups, and feature usage. This data will be valuable for product improvements and marketing strategies.
Refactor the CSS code to improve consistency across the application, remove redundant styles, and ensure responsive design principles are followed throughout.
Deploy the application to the production environment after thorough testing. Ensure that all features are functional and the environment is optimized for scalability and security.
Optimize both frontend and backend code to reduce page load times. Focus on asset compression, caching strategies, and minimizing HTTP requests.
Develop a comprehensive analytics page with charts, graphs, and key metrics. The page should provide users with valuable insights into their activity and data.
Set up the payment gateway integration to handle transactions securely. Test various payment methods to ensure smooth transaction flows for users.
Enhance the error handling in API responses by providing meaningful error messages. Improve the ability to handle edge cases and unexpected scenarios gracefully.
Refactor session management logic to improve the user experience and security. Ensure sessions are properly managed and provide users with clear notifications for session expiration.

summary: Conduct usability testing on new features
description: Test the newly added features with real users to identify usability issues. Focus on areas where users may experience difficulty or confusion.
Design a dedicated landing page for marketing campaigns. Include components like banners, call-to-action buttons, and contact forms to encourage conversions.
Optimize the landing pages for search engines by improving meta tags, header tags, and content. Ensure pages load quickly and are fully mobile-optimized to rank higher.

summary: Update terms of service and privacy policy
description: Revise the terms of service and privacy policy documents to reflect changes in the platform's features, security measures, and legal requirements. Publish the updated documents for user review.
Refactor the existing frontend components to ensure better maintainability and reuse. Focus on breaking components into smaller, more manageable pieces that can be reused across the platform.
Identify performance bottlenecks in the database and optimize query execution times. Look into indexing, query refactoring, and data normalization to improve speed.
Deploy a hotfix for a critical BUG affecting key user workflows. Ensure the issue is resolved quickly and the fix is tested in a live environment.

Streamline the user registration process by removing unnecessary steps. Simplify the form fields and implement automatic error detection to improve the user experience. Ensure that the registration flow is responsive and user-friendly across devices.

summary: Update user profile page for mobile optimization
description: Redesign the user profile page to ensure it is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. Ensure that text, buttons, and images resize appropriately on smaller screens while maintaining usability and clarity.

summary: Add support for user feedback system
description: Implement a system where users can submit feedback directly from the app. The feedback should be categorized and stored securely, allowing admins to view, prioritize, and respond to user suggestions and complaints.

summary: Integrate error tracking and reporting tool
description: Set up an error tracking tool like Sentry or Rollbar to monitor and report any application errors in real-time. Ensure the tool logs detailed error messages and helps developers resolve issues efficiently.

Create a comprehensive FAQ section that addresses common user queries about the product. Organize the questions by category and make it easy for users to find answers. Implement a search function to quickly locate relevant information.

Implement multi-language support for the application. Allow users to choose their preferred language, with translations for all relevant content. Ensure that the system supports future addition of languages without breaking existing features.
Break down the existing codebase into smaller, reusable modules. Focus on enhancing the maintainability and scalability of the project by refactoring large components into more manageable pieces.

summary: Set up email notification system for user actions
description: Implement an email notification system that sends out automatic alerts for key user actions, such as account creation, password change, and purchase confirmation. Ensure email templates are customizable.

Develop comprehensive documentation for the public API, including authentication details, request/response examples, and error codes. Ensure that developers can easily integrate with the API by following clear and concise instructions.

summary: Fix UI BUG in analytics page
description: Resolve the UI BUG causing misalignment of elements in the analytics page. This issue only occurs in certain screen sizes and needs to be fixed to ensure consistency across devices.

Enhance the accessibility of the login page by ensuring that all form elements are properly labeled and that the page can be navigated using a keyboard. Implement screen reader support and high-contrast visuals for better user experience.

summary: Add analytics tracking to user interactions
description: Implement tracking for key user interactions like button clicks and form submissions on the website. Use this data to improve user experience and inform future design decisions.

summary: Setup cloud infrastructure for app deployment
description: Set up cloud infrastructure on AWS or Google Cloud to deploy the application. Ensure scalability and security configurations are in place to handle high traffic and sensitive user data.
Set up an automated CI/CD pipeline to streamline deployment processes. Integrate with GitHub and set up build triggers for every pull request to ensure smoother releases and less downtime.
Implement a user authentication system that allows users to register, log in, and reset passwords. Use JWT tokens for secure session management and integrate social login options for convenience.
Analyze and optimize the front-end assets to reduce page load times. Compress images, minify scripts, and implement lazy loading for images and other resources to speed up the application.
Design a clean and intuitive user dashboard that aggregates the most important user data in a clear layout. Implement charts, tables, and quick links to essential sections of the app.
Integrate the application with an external analytics service like Google Analytics or Mixpanel. Ensure that all user interactions and app events are tracked and sent to the service.
Refactor the authentication module to improve security and performance. Implement multi-factor authentication and enhance the password reset flow to be more user-friendly.
Build a real-time chat system where users can send and receive messages. Ensure message delivery is fast and supports rich media like images and links.
Implement a push notification system to notify users about important events, like new messages or system updates. Ensure that notifications can be customized and targeted to specific user groups.
